snippet.title: Developer Update | The Workshop | Overwatch
snippet.description:
Overwatch Workshop is now testing on the PTR! Roll up your sleeves, get to the drawing board, and craft your marvelous creations! Learn more about this new feature with Game Director Jeff Kaplan.

00:19 – Jeff introduces The Workshop
00:49 – The conception of this new scripting system
01:43 – This is a “Power User” feature with great accessibility to all players 
05:05 – The Workshop Inspector and its purpose
05:40 – Jeff hopes the community will experiment and be inspired by this feature
06:15 – Jeff explains that The Workshop is NOT a map editor 
06:40 – Jeff explains The Workshop’s Share functionality 

Begin your watch: http://buyoverwatch.com
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch
Join us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch
